# Planning Division

__

#### Department of Planning and Development Alert:

CONTACT INFORMATION:  Our offices are open 8:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m., Monday through Friday. 

__

703-324-1380 TTY 711

__

Email Us

__

12055 Government Center Parkway, Suite 730  
Fairfax, VA 22035

__

Kelly Atkinson  
Director

# Comprehensive Plan - Plan Areas

The four Area Plans identify key elements for implementing the Policy Plan's goals and objectives at the more detailed Planning District and Community Planning Sector levels.

## 

Comprehensive Plan Areas

##  Area I 

**Cover and Front Matter **

**Area I Overview**

**Annandale Planning District **

  * Annandale Community Business Center (CBC)

  * Beltway South Industrial Area

  * Ravensworth Industrial Area




**Baileys Planning District **

  * Baileys Crossroads Community Business Center (CBC)

  * Seven Corners Community Business Center (CBC)




**Jefferson Planning District**

**Lincolnia Planning District **

  * Lincolnia Community Business Center




**Merrifield Suburban Center (includes the Dunn Loring transit Area) **

##  Area II 

**Cover and Front Matter**

**Area II Overview**

**Fairfax Planning District**

  * Flint Hill Suburban Center




**McLean Planning District**

  * McLean Community Business Center (CBC)

  * West Falls Church Transit Station Area (TSA)

  * McLean CBC Open Space Design Standards




**McLean Design Guidelines**

**Tysons Urban Center**

**Vienna Planning District**

  * Vienna Transit Station Area (TSA)




##  Area III 

**Cover and Front Matter**

**Area III Overview**

**Bull Run Planning District **

  * Centreville Area and Suburban Center




**Dulles Suburban Center**

  * Innovation Center Transit Station Area




**Fairfax Center Area**

**Pohick Planning District**

**Reston**

  * Reston Transit Station Areas (TSA)

  * Wiehle-Reston East Transit Station Area (TSA)

  * Reston Town Center Transit Station Area (TSA)

  * Herndon Transit Station Area (TSA)




**Upper Potomac Planning District**

##  Area IV 

**Cover and Front Matter **

**Area IV Overview**

**Franconia-Springfield Area and Fort Belvoir North Area**

  * Franconia-Springfield Transit Station Area (TSA)

  * Springfield Community Business Center (CBC)




**Lower Potomac Planning District **

  * Lorton-South Route 1 Community Planning Sector, LP2




**Mount Vernon Planning District **

  * Huntington Transit Station Area (TSA)




**Richmond Highway Corridor **

  * Richmond Highway Corridor, Urban Design Recommendations

  * North Gateway Community Business Center (CBC)

  * Penn Daw Community Business Center (CBC)

  * Beacon/Groveton Community Business Center (CBC)

  * Hybla Valley/Gum Springs Community Business Center (CBC)

  * South County Center Community Business Center (CBC)

  * Woodlawn Community Business Center (CBC)

  * Suburban Neighborhood Areas (SNAS)




**Rose Hill Planning District**

  * Van Dorn Transit Station Area (TSA)

  * Kingstowne Community Business Center (CBC)




**Springfield Planning District**

  * I-95 Industrial Corridor
